name: news-search-app
description: 1. npm init -y 2. "tailwind": "npx tailwindcss -i ./src/input.css -o ./public/css/style.css --watch",     "prettier": "npx prettier --write **/*.html" sa script 3. npm install -D tailwindcss postcss-cli autoprefixer npx tailwindcss init 4. "./public/**/*.{html,js}"` on tailwind config 5. npm install -D prettier prettier-plugin-tailiwindcss 6. just restart
